name: IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 and WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9 on a single virtual machine - Amazon EC2
description: This template deploys IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 and WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9 on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.displayName: IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 and WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9 on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 and WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9 on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition - one instance, one database
IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment - standalone server

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1
IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. IBM Knowledge Center for DB2 V11.1 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0
4. IBM Knowledge Center for WAS ND V9 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSAW57_9.0.0
5. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
